chore(kcmt): update last run log with latest execution stats

Update timestamps, durations, commit hashes, messages, file paths, and
processing rates in the last run JSON log to reflect the most recent
kcmt execution. This ensures accurate tracking of tool performance,
successful commits, and metadata for debugging and monitoring purposes.
